RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POLITICAL ASTRAY away alertly was measured under pressure through the turn kicking clear in upper stretch drawing out along the inside while full of run. FESSIN UP off slowly lagged through the turn responding in upper stretch angling in to the rail finishing strong. NYSSA chased the pace through the turn vying near mid track down the lane moving evenly late. NO CAUSE TO DOUBT pressed hard through the turn wearing out in upper stretch. HAKABUMBUM was always a step slow. DEVINE BY DESIGN slow early saved ground to upper stretch posing no menace there. BLUEBERRY QUEEN was never involved racing wide through the lane. SHEZ FIRED UP showed early speed then gave way to upper stretch. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF HAKABUMBUM AGAINST THE RIDER OF FESSIN UP CLAIMING INTERFERENCE NEAR THE EIGHTH POLE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Devine by Design
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Nyssa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, mid track lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Political Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, measured narrow lead, kicked clear lane

ENTRY.NAME: No Cause to Doubt
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fessin Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged through turn, fired inside lane, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Fired Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Blueberry Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Hakabumbum
ENTRY.COMMENT: always a step slow

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN ACCOUNT pressed the pace carrying a short lead racing abreast rival to upper stretch putting away foe inside the eighth pole drawing out late. DE PURA SANGRE broke sharply pressing from the inside dueling through the turn into upper stretch ceding the issue late hanging on for place. HONEY BOURBON slow early swung out to upper stretch finding stride late closing after the fact. ALGODONAL pressed early chasing on the turn wearing out in upper stretch. COURTED hustled along lost ground to upper stretch tiring there. BEST OF YOU was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Best of You
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: De Pura Sangre
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed pace, dueled inside to lane, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led through turn, abreast lane, moved off late

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, ran on after the fact

ENTRY.NAME: Algodonal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased on turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Courted
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled outside, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KANFU sent hard shook clear on the turn angling out toward mid track in upper stretch holding firm to wire. BEE WINGS steadied at the break would rally into upper stretch saving place from between horses late. LELAWALA slow early cut the corner to upper stretch finishing well along the rail. HIGH HEAVEN pressed early chasing to upper stretch finishing three deep. AVENIDA MANANA faded on the turn. WALKIN PRINCESS lost action ;leaving the turn easing in upper stretch crossing the wire walking off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Avenida Manana
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied break, rallied inside to lane, saved place between foes

ENTRY.NAME: High Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased to lane, three deep late

ENTRY.NAME: Walkin Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost action, eased lane, made wire

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, cut corner to lane, finished well on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Kanfu
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, cleared on turn, angled out lane, held firm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 17, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWERS FOR LISA sent clear set the pace through the backside being pressed through the far turn into upper stretch finding more there to win clear. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF tracked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn extending from mid track down the lane saving place. LEMON BLITZ saved ground rallying to vie on the turn into upper stretch coming up a bit short along the rail. KNOWN unhurried early circled out vying on the far turn weakening in the six path down the lane. GOOD IDEA stalked the pace through the backside then was shuffled back on the far turn failing to regroup. MR. SKITTLES gave way from the quarter pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Known
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled out far turn, vied to lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Skittles
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way into upper stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Blitz
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, vied on rail to lane, came up a bit short

ENTRY.NAME: Flowers for Lisa
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear set pace, pressed far turn into lane, had more

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, pressed far turn, extended 5 wide lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, shuffled back far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 17, 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIDDEN RULER slow early saved ground to upper stretch finding a late burst along the rail getting up in time. DONNELS CREEK rushed up to take a short lead into the turn shaking clear in upper stretch digging in from the three path being grabbed from the rail in the last yards. TEN TWENTY NINE slow early swung out on the turn gaining late from mid track. PRETTY STORMY chased early dropping off on the turn racing evenly through the lane. QUAD EIGHTS pressured the pace through the turn wearing out in upper stretch. COMPLEX JUSTICE hustled along pursuing through the turn would tire in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Donnels Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up inside, short lead turn, shook clear lane, grabbed late

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, late burst on rail, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Complex Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out turn, gained late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Quad Eights
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wore out lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bre d Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY GRASS IS BLUE pressed the pace dueling inside of rival through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch pouring it on late. SUTTON BREEZE pressured a quick pace dueling abreast rival through the turn ceding in upper stretch hanging on late a weary second best. MALIBU ROCK STAR raced evenly throughout gaining some ground on a weary runner up down the lane. EMJAY played no factor. FROSTED WHITE FACE bumped at the break trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted White Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped at the break, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Rock Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Emjay
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: My Grass Is Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, cleared top lane, drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast turn, ceded lane, weary second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Est imating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INCORRUPTIBLE chased the pace looming six wide in upper stretch taking over late. ALFIE SOLOMONS sent clear set the pace through the turn drifting out at the head of the lane being overpowered from the outside soon after hanging on for place. BROTHER SKYE chased the pace through the turn losing path near mid track in upper stretch angling inside hanging late. QUICK ENTRY raced evenly throughout lacking surge. PALACE PRINCE a step slow through the turn raced evenly down the lane. LOST IN MANHATTAN faded on the turn. SAG HARBOR failed to respond. HEARTNESS was always outrun. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF BROTHER SKYE AGAINST THE RIDER OF ALFIE SOLOMONS FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Alfie Solomons
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, drifted out top lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, lost path top lane, angled inside, hung,

ENTRY.NAME: Lost in Manhattan
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Incorruptible
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased on turn, 6 wide lane, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Heartness
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked surge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELUSIVE MOTION sped clear early hustled through the turn into upper stretch holding safe late under a drive. ROLL DEM BONES slow early saved ground rallying in upper stretch angling off the rail late closing the gap while securing place. OLD FORTY FIVE slow early raced evenly to upper stretch mustering enough to best the others. COMMUNICATION FAIL chased a loose leader through the turn weakening in upper stretch. EDUARD was never involved. VERRAZANO LEGACY chased through the turn tiring in upper stretch. IMISSBAYMEADOWS was always outrun.
